desc: Malaysia's own dairy farm with quality fresh milk, ice-cream and freshest meat. MUULK milk is sourced from Jersey Friesian cows. We take pride in lightly pasteurized and non-homogenized dairy to preserve taste and nutrition. MUULK safeguards halal in uber-clean facilities. We deliver to your home around Klang Valley.

layout.text: Nutrient-rich liquid food produced by healthy cows milk
